Filtering Classes¶

ANDFilter¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.ANDFilter : public SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.IFilter¶

Represents an AND boolean filter statement.

Public Functions

ANDFilter (IFilter filterExpressionLeft, IFilter filterExpressionRight)¶

Create a new AND filter statement. The left and right hand sides of the supplied statements are conjoined with an AND between them.

Param filterExpressionLeft

The left hand side of the statement.

Param filterExpressionRight

The right hand side of the statement.

Properties

string FilterString { get; set; }¶

Get the filter string for this statement.

ORFilter¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.ORFilter : public SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.IFilter¶

Represents an OR boolean filter statement.

Public Functions

ORFilter (IFilter filterExpressionLeft, IFilter filterExpressionRight)¶

Create a new OR filter statement. The left and right hand sides of the supplied statements are conjoined with an OR between them.

Param filterExpressionLeft

The left hand side of the statement.

Param filterExpressionRight

The right hand side of the statement.

Properties

string FilterString { get; set; }¶

Get the filter string for this statement.

Filter¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.Filter : public SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.IFilter¶

Class representing a Filter statement using various SqlOperators.

Public Functions

Filter (string strFilterName, SqlOperators sqlOperator, string strFilterValue)¶

Create a new Filter statement with the specified name (column), SqlOperators operator, and value (search text).

Param strFilterName

The name of the column this statement is for.

Param sqlOperator

The SqlOperators that this statement applies.

Param strFilterValue

The search text to apply to the column using the specified SqlOperators.

Properties

string FilterString { get; set; }¶

Getter for the actual filter string of this statement.

FilterExpressionList¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.FilterExpressionList : public IEnumerable, public IEnumerator¶

Class representing a list of enumerable filter expressions.

IFilter¶

interface SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.IFilter¶

Interace for any class that is a Filter.

Subclassed by SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.ANDFilter, SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.Filter, SurveyManager.utility.Filtering.ORFilter

Properties

string FilterString { get; set; }¶

All implementing classes must implement this property to get their filter string.
